005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
011
012import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
013import nl.talsmasoftware.lazy4j.Lazy;
014
015/**
016 * A base class for definitions defined globally within a Metaschema module.
017 *
018 * @param <MODULE>
019 *          the Java type of the containing module
020 * @param <INSTANCE>
021 *          the expected Java type of an instance of this definition
022 */
023public abstract class AbstractGlobalDefinition<MODULE extends IModule, INSTANCE extends INamedInstance>
024    implements IDefinition {
025  @NonNull
026  private final MODULE module;
027  @NonNull
028  private final Lazy<QName> qname;
029  @NonNull
030  private final Lazy<QName> definitionQName;
031
032  /**
033   * Construct a new global definition.
034   *
035   * @param module
036   *          the parent module containing this instance
037   * @param initializer
038   *          the callback used to generate qualified names
039   */
040  protected AbstractGlobalDefinition(@NonNull MODULE module, @NonNull NameInitializer initializer) {
041    this.module = module;
042    this.qname = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getEffectiveName())));
043    this.definitionQName = ObjectUtils.notNull(Lazy.lazy(() -> initializer.apply(getName())));
044  }
045
046  @Override
047  public final MODULE getContainingModule() {
048    return module;
049  }
050
051  @SuppressWarnings("null")
052  @Override
053  public final QName getXmlQName() {
054    return qname.get();
055  }
056
057  @SuppressWarnings("null")
058  @Override
059  public final QName getDefinitionQName() {
060    return definitionQName.get();
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  public final boolean isInline() {
065    // never inline
066    return false;
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public final INSTANCE getInlineInstance() {
071    // never inline
072    return null;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Provides a callback for generating a qualified name from a name.
077   */
078  @FunctionalInterface
079  public interface NameInitializer {
080    /**
081     * Produce a qualified name by parsing the provided name.
082     *
083     * @param name
084     *          the name to parse
085     * @return the qualified name for the provided name
086     */
087    @NonNull
088    QName apply(@NonNull String name);
089  }
090}
